name: msdocs-mcp-server
title: Microsoft Learn MCP server
summary: Learn MCP server is a remote MCP server that connects Copilots and AI agents to Microsoft’s official, up-to-date documentation
description: The Microsoft Learn MCP server is a remote Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables Copilots and AI agents to securely access trusted, up-to-date knowledge from Microsoft’s official documentation via streamable HTTP—allowing them to search content, retrieve complete articles, and surface relevant code samples to deliver accurate, grounded responses.

useCases.name: Search Functionality
useCases.description: Search and fetch official Microsoft documentation and code samples.
